gurmukhi: ੴ> ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਪ੍ਰਸਾਦਿ ||
transliteration: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?
translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

gurmukhi: ੧ ਮੰਗਲਾ ਚਰਣ
transliteration: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?
translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

gurmukhi: ਅਾਦਿ ਪੁਰਖ ਅਾਦੇਸੁ ਹੈ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸਚੁ ਨਾੳੁ ਸਦਵਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Aadi Purakh Aadaysu Hai Satiguru Sachu Naau Sadavaaiaa.
translation: Salutation to that primal Lord who is known by the true name of Satigura.

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰਿ ਵਰਨ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਕਰਿ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਚਾ ਪੰਥੁ ਚਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Chaari Varan Gurasikh Kari Guramoukhi Sachaa Pandu Chalaaiaa.
translation: Transforming all the four varnas into the Sikhs of the Guru, that true Guru (Gum Nanak Dev) has initiated a true way for the Gurmukhs.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਗਾਂਵਦੇ ਸਤਿਗੁਰੁ ਸਬਦੁ ਅਨਾਹਦ ਵਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Mili Gaanvaday Satiguru Sabadu Anaahadu Vaaiaa.
translation: The true Guru has vibrated such an unstruck word which is sung in the holy congregation by one and all.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਸਾਖੀ ੳੁਪਦੇਸੁ ਕਰਿ ਅਾਪਿ ਤਰੈ ਸੈਂਸਾਰ ਤਰਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Gur Saakhee Oupadaysu Kari Aapi Tarai Saisaaru Taraaiaa.
translation: The Gurmukhs recite the teachings of the Guru; they go across and make the world go across (the world ocean).

gurmukhi: ਪਾਨ ਸੁਪਾਰੀ ਕਥੁ ਮਿਲਿ ਚੂਨੇ ਰੰਗੁ ਸੁਰੰਗੁ ਚੜ੍ਹਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Paan Soupaaree Kadu Mili Choonay Rangu Surang Charhhaaiaa.
translation: As in betel leaf mixing of catechu, lime and betel nut makes a nice colour, similarly, gurmukh way of life consisting of all the four varnas is beautiful.

gurmukhi: ਗਿਅਾਨੁ ਧਿਅਾਨੁ ਸਿਮਰਣ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਗੁਰ ਪੂਰਾ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Giaanu Dhiaanu Simarani Jougati Guramati Mili Gur Pooraa Paaiaa.
translation: He, who having met the perfect Gum has attained Gurmati; the wisdom of the Guru, has in fact identified the teachnique of knowledge, concentration and meditation.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਚਖੰਡੁ ਵਸਾੲਿਅਾ ||੧||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Sach Khandu Vasaaiaa ?1?
translation: The true Guru has established the abode of truth in the form of holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ੨ ਗੁਰੁ ਨਾਨਕ ਨੇ ਕਿਵੇਂ ਬਚਾੲਿਅਾ
translation: The true Guru arranged the glimpse of the imperceptible     ?

gurmukhi: ਪਰ ਤਨ ਪਰ ਧਨ ਪਰ ਨਿੰਦ ਮੇਟਿ ਨਾਮੁ ਦਾਨੁ ੲਿਸਨਾਨੁ ਦਿੜਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Paratan Paradhan Paranid Mayti Naamu Daanu Isanaanu Dirhaaiaa.
translation: Holding (me) back from other's body, wealth and slander, the true Guru, has made me resolute for the practice of meditation on Lord's name, ablution and charity.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਮਨੁ ਸਮਝਾੲਿਕੈ ਬਾਹਰਿ ਜਾਂਦਾ ਵਰਜਿ ਰਹਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guramati Manu Samajhaai Kai Baahari Jaandaa Varaji Rahaaiaa.
translation: People also making their minds understand through the teaching of the Gum have restrained it from going astray.

gurmukhi: ਮਨਿ ਜਿਤੈ ਜਗੁ ਜਿਣਿ ਲੲਿਅਾ ਅਸਟਧਾਤੁ ੲਿਕਧਾਤੁ ਕਰਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Mani Jitai Jagu Jini Laiaa Asat Dhaatu Ik Dhaatu Karaaiaa.
translation: As the eight metals touching the philosopher's stone become gold, similarly, the gurmukhs, having conquered their mind have conquered the whole world.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਸ ਹੋੲੇ ਪਾਰਸਹੁ ਗੁਰ ੳੁਪਦੇਸੁ ਅਵੇਸੁ ਦਿਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Paaras Hoay Paarasahu Gur Oupadaysu Avaysu Dikhaaiaa.
translation: Such is the effect of the Guru's teaching that the Sikh acquires the same qualifies as if a stone by touching a philosopher's stone has itself become another philosopher's stone.

gurmukhi: ਜੋਗ ਭੋਗ ਜਿਣਿ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਭਾੲਿ ਭਗਤਿ ਭੈ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਵਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Jog Bhog Jini Jougati Kari Bhaai Bhagati Bhai Aapu Gavaaiaa.
translation: Systematically, having won yoga as well as pleasures and getting immersed in devotion they have lost their fears.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੁ ਗੲਿਅਾ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਿਅਾ ਭਗਤਿ ਵਛਲ ਹੋੲਿ ਵਸਗਤਿ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Aapu Gaiaa Aapi Varatiaa Bhagati Vachhal Hoi Vasagati Aaiaa.
translation: When the ego vanished, God was not only realized as diffused all around, but also because of love for His devotees

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾੲਿਅਾ ||੨||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Vichi Alakhu Lakhaaiaa ?2?
translation: He came under their control.

gurmukhi: ੩ ਅਸਾਧ ਸਤਿਗੰਗ ਨੇ ਸਾਧੇ
translation: Chronic ailments cured

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਿ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਦੁਖ ਸੁਖ ਸਮਕਰਿ ਸਾਧੇ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Mili Saadhasangi Guramoukhi Doukh Soukh Sam Kari Saadhay.
translation: In the holy congregation, getting attuned to the Word, the gurmukh treats pains and joys in the same vein.

gurmukhi: ਹੳੁਮੈ ਦੁਰਮਤਿ ਪਰਹਰੀ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਅਾਰਾਧੇ
transliteration: Haoumai Duramati Paraharee Guramati Satigur Purakhu Aaraadhay.
translation: He renounces egotist ill thoughts and adopting the teachings of the true Guru adores the Timeless Lord.

gurmukhi: ਸਿਵ ਸਕਤੀ ਨੋ ਲੰਘਿਕੈ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਸਹਜ ਸਮਾਧੇ
transliteration: Siv Sakatee No Laghi Kai Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Sahaj Samaadhay.
translation: Going beyond the phenomena of the Siva-Sakti (maya), the Gurnzukh calmly merges in the fruits of delight.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰੁ ਪਰਮੇਸਰੁ ੲੇਕ ਜਾਣਿ ਦੂਜਾ ਭਾੳੁ ਮਿਟਾੲਿ ੳੁਪਾਧੇ
transliteration: Guru Paramaysaru Ayku Jaani Doojaa Bhaau Mitaai Oupaadhay.
translation: Considering Guru and God as one, he decimates the ills of the sense of duality.

gurmukhi: ਜੰਮਣ ਮਰਣਹੁ ਬਾਹਰੇ ਅਜਰਾਵਰਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਅਗਮ ਅਗਾਧੇ
transliteration: Janman Maranahu Baaharay Ajaraavari Mili Agam Agaadhay.
translation: Gurmukhs go out of the cycle of transmigration and meeting that unapproachable and unfathomable Lord go away from the impacts of time (oldage).

gurmukhi: ਅਾਸ ਨ ਤ੍ਰਾਸ ੳੁਦਾਸ ਘਰਿ ਹਰਖ ਸੋਗ ਵਿਹੁ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਖਾਧੇ
transliteration: Aas N Traas Udaas Ghari Harakh Sog Vihu Anmrit Khaadhay.
translation: Hopes and fears do not torture them. They reside in home while being detached and to them nectar or poison, happiness and sorrows are all the same.

gurmukhi: ਮਹਾ ਅਸਾਧ ਸਾਧਸੰਗ ਸਾਧੇ ||੩||
transliteration: Mahaa Asaadh Saadhasang Saadhay ?3?
translation: In the holy congregation, the frightening chronic ailments are also cured.

gurmukhi: ੪ ਸਿੱਖ ਕਰਣੀ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗ
translation: Conduct of a Sikh

gurmukhi: ਪੳੁਣੁ ਪਾਣੀ ਬੈਸੰਤਰੋ ਰਜ ਗੁਣੁ ਤਮ ਗੁਣੁ ਸਤ ਗੁਣੁ ਜਿਤਾ
transliteration: Paounu Paanee Baisantaro Raj Gounu Tam Gounu Sat Gounu Jitaa.
translation: Air, water, fire and the three qualities – tranquillity, activity and inertness have been conquered by the Sikh.

gurmukhi: ਮਨ ਬਚ ਕਰਮ ਸੰਕਲਪ ਕਰਿ ੲਿਕ ਮਨਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਵਿਗੋੲਿ ਦੁਚਿਤਾ
transliteration: Man Bach Karam Sankalap Kari Ik Mani Hoi Vigoi Douchitaa.
translation: With the concentration of mind, speech, action and meditating upon the One, he has lost the sense of duality.

gurmukhi: ਲੋਕ ਵੇਦ ਗੁਰ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਲਿਵ ਅੰਦਰਿ ੲਿਕੁ ਬਾਹਰਿ ਬਹੁ ਭਿਤਾ
transliteration: Lok Vayd Gur Giaan Liv Andari Iku Baahari Bahu Bhitaa.
translation: Absorption in the knowledge of the Guru is his conduct in the world. In his innerself he is One (with the Lord) while he performs diverse duties in the world.

gurmukhi: ਮਾਤ ਲੋਕ ਪਾਤਾਲ ਜਿਣਿ ਸੁਰਗ ਲੋਕ ਵਿਚਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਥਿਤਾ
transliteration: Maat Lok Paataal Jini Surag Lok Vichi Hoi Aditaa.
translation: Conquering the earth and the nether world he establishes himself in heavens.

gurmukhi: ਮਿਠਾ ਬੋਲਣੁ ਨਿਵਿ ਚਲਣੁ ਹਥਹੁ ਦੇ ਕਰਿ ਪਤਿਤ ਪਵਿਤਾ
transliteration: Mitdaa Bolanu Nivi Chalanu Hadahu Day Kari Patit Pavitaa.
translation: By speaking sweetly, behaving humbly and bestowing charities with one's own hands, even the fallen ones have become pure.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ ਅਤੁਲੁ ਅਡੋਲ ਅਮੋਲ ਅਮਿਤਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Paaiaa Atulu Adolu Amolu Amitaa.
translation: Thus, the gurmukh attains incomparable and invalauable fruits of delight.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਪੀੜਿ ਨਪਿਤਾ ||੪||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Mili Peerhi Napitaa ?4?
translation: Associating with the holy congregation he squeezes out the ego (from the mind).

gurmukhi: ੫ ਸਿੱਖ ਗਤੀ, ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗ-ਚਾਰ ਗਿਣਤੀ
translation: Successful transaction they do in the holy congregation ,  -

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰਿ ਪਦਾਰਥ ਹਥ ਜੋੜਿ ਹੁਕਮੀ ਬੰਦੇ ਰਹਨਿ ਖੜੋਤੇ
transliteration: Chaari Padaarad Had Jorhi Houkamee Banday Rahani Kharhotay.
translation: The four ideals (dharma, arth, ktim, moks) stand w'th folded hands around the obedient servant (of the Lord).

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰੇ ਚਕ ਨਿਵਾੲਿਅਾ ਪੈਰੀ ਪੈ ੲਿਕ ਸੂਤਿ ਪਰੋਤੇ
transliteration: Chaaray Chak Nivaaiaa Pairee Pai Ik Sooti Parotay.
translation: This servant has made the four directions bow to him by bowing to One who has strung one and all into one thread.

gurmukhi: ਵੇਦ ਨ ਪਾੲਿਨਿ ਭੇਦੁ ਕਿਹੁ ਪੜਿ ਪੜਿ ਪੰਡਿਤ ਸੁਣਿ ਸੁਣਿ ਸ੍ਰੋਤੇ
transliteration: Vayd N Paaini Bhaydu Kihu Parhi Parhi Pandit Souni Souni Srotay.
translation: The Vedas, the reciter pandits of the Vedas and their audience cannot understand His mystery.

gurmukhi: ਚਹੁ ਜੁਗਿ ਅੰਦਰ ਜਾਗਦੀ ਓਤਿ ਪੋਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਜਗਮਗ ਜੋਤੇ
transliteration: Chahu Jougi Andar Jaagadee Aoti Poti Mili Jagamag Jotay.
translation: His ever radiant flame glows in all the four yugso ages.

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰਿ ਵਰਨ ੲਿਕ ਵਰਨ ਹੋੲਿ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਵੜੀਅਨਿ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਗੋਤੇ
transliteration: Chaari Varan Ik Varan Hoi Gurasikh Varheeani Guramoukhi Gotay.
translation: The Sikhs of all the four vamas became one varna and they have entered the (larger) clan of Gurmukhs.

gurmukhi: ਧਰਮਸਾਲ ਵਿਚਿ ਬੀਜਦੇ ਕਰਿ ਗੁਰਪੁਰਬ ਸੁ ਵਣਜ ਸਓਤੇ
transliteration: Dharamasaal Vichi Beejaday Kari Gurapurab Su Vanaj Saaotay.
translation: They at the abodes of dharma (Gurdvaras) celebrate anniversaries of the Gurus and thus sow the seeds of virtuous actions.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਦਾਦੇ ਪੋਤੇ ||੫||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Mili Daaday Potay ?5?
translation: In the holy congregation the grandson and the grandfather (i.e. young and old) are equal to each other.

gurmukhi: ੬ ਗੁਰਭਾੲੀ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗ-ਪੰਜ ਗਿਣਤੀ
translation: Holy congregation is adorned by the fellow disciples  -

gurmukhi: ਕਾਮ ਕ੍ਰੋਧੁ ਅਹੰਕਾਰੁ ਸਾਧਿ ਲੋਭ ਮੋਹ ਦੀ ਜੋਹ ਮਿਟਾੲੀ
transliteration: Kaam Krodhu Ahankaar Saadhi Lobh Moh Dee Joh Mitaaee.
translation: Sikhs in sadh sangat (holy company) controlling the kam (lust) krodh (anger), ahatilair ego), decimate their greed and infatuation.

gurmukhi: ਸਤੁ ਸੰਤੋਖ ਦੲਿਅਾ ਧਰਮੁ ਅਰਥੁ ਸਮਰਥੁ ਸੁਗਰਥੁ ਸਮਾੲੀ
transliteration: Satu Santokhu Daiaa Dharamu Aradu Samaradu Sougaradu Samaaee.
translation: In the holy congregation, truth contentment, compassion, dharma, wealth, power all are subsumed.

gurmukhi: ਪੰਜੇ ਤਤ ੳੁਲੰਘਿਅਾ ਪੰਜਿ ਸਬਦ ਵਜੀ ਵਾਧਾੲੀ
transliteration: Panjay Tat Ulaghiaa Panji Sabad Vajee Vaadhaaee.
translation: Crossing the five elements, the felicitation of the five words (instruments) are. played there.

gurmukhi: ਪੰਜੇ ਮੁਦ੍ਰਾ ਵਸਿ ਕਰਿ ਪੰਚਾੲਿਣੁ ਹੁੲਿ ਦੇਸ ਦੁਹਾੲੀ
transliteration: Panjay Mudraa Vasi Kari Panchaainu Hui Days Duhaaee.
translation: Having controlled five yogic postures, the respectable member of the congregation become famous all around.

gurmukhi: ਪਰਮੇਸਰ ਹੈ ਪੰਜ ਮਿਲਿ ਲੇਖ ਅਲੇਖ ਨ ਕੀਮਤਿ ਪਾੲੀ
transliteration: Paramaysar Hai Panj Mili Laykh Alaykh N Keemati Paaee.
translation: Where the five persons sit together, Lord God, is there; this mystery of indescribable Lord cannot be known.

gurmukhi: ਪੰਜ ਮਿਲੇ ਪਰਪੰਚ ਤਜਿ ਅਨਹਦ ਸਬਦ ਸਬਦਿ ਲਿਵ ਲਾੲੀ
transliteration: Panj Milay Parapanch Taji Anahad Sabad Sabadi Liv Laaee.
translation: But only those five meet (to sit together) who repudiating hypocrisy have merged their consciousness in the unstruck melody of the Word.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਸੋਹਨਿ ਗੁਰ ਭਾੲੀ ||੬||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Sohani Gur Bhaaee ?6?
translation: Such fellow-disciples adome the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ੭ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ, ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗ-ਛੇ ਗਿਣਤੀ
translation: Gurmukh, association with the saints  count of six),  -

gurmukhi: ਛਿਅ ਦਰਸਨ ਤਰਸਣਿ ਘਣੇ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਤਿਗੁਰੁ ਦਰਸਨੁ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Chhia Darasan Tarasani Ghanay Guramoukhi Satiguru Darasanu Paaiaa.
translation: Followers of six (Indian. philosophies) crave intensely but only gurmukh gets the glimpse of the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਛਿਅ ਸਾਸਤ੍ਰ ਸਮਝਾਵਣੀ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਗੁਰੁ ੳੁਪਦੇਸੁ ਦਿੜਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Chhia Saasatr Samajhaavanee Guramoukhi Guru Oupadaysu Dirhaaiaa.
translation: The six Shastras make one understand in a round about manner but gurmukhs make the teachings of the Guru firmly lodged in the heart.

gurmukhi: ਰਾਗ ਨਾਦ ਵਿਸਮਾਦ ਵਿਚਿ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Raag Naad Visamaad Vichi Guramati Satigur Sabadu Sounaaiaa.
translation: All the musical measures and melodies are wonder-struck to feel that

gurmukhi: ਛਿਅ ਰੁਤੀ ਕਰਿ ਵਰਤਮਾਨ ਸੂਰਜੁ ੲਿਕੁ ਚਲਤੁ ਵਰਤਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Chhia Routee Kari Varatamaan Sooraju Iku Chalatu Varataaiaa.
translation: The true Guru is such as the one sun remains stabilized in all the six seasons.

gurmukhi: ਛਿਅ ਰਸ ਸਾੳੁ ਨ ਪਾੲਿਨੀ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖੁ ਫਲੁ ਪਿਰਮ ਚਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Chhia Ras Saau N Paainee Guramoukhi Soukhu Phalu Piramu Chakhaaiaa.
translation: Such a pleasure-fruit has been attained by Gurmukhs, the taste of which could not be known by six pleasures.

gurmukhi: ਜਤੀ ਸਤੀ ਚਿਰੁ ਜੀਵਣੇ ਚਕ੍ਵਰਤਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਮੋਹੇ ਮਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Jatee Satee Chiru Jeevanay Chakravarati Hoi Mohay Maaiaa.
translation: Anchorites, followers of truth, long lived ones and universally acclaimed ones are all engrossed in delusions.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਸਹਜਿ ਸਮਾੲਿਅਾ ||੭||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Mili Sahaji Samaaiaa ?7?
translation: Only joining the holy congregation, one could be absorbed in one's innate nature.

gurmukhi: ੮ ਸ਼ਬਦ ਕਮਾੲੀ, ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗ-ਸੱਤ ਗਿਣਤੀ
translation: Discipline of Word, association with saints  the count of seven ,  -

gurmukhi: ਸਤ ਸਮੁੰਦ ਸਮਾੲਿ ਲੈ ਭਵਜਲ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਰਹੇ ਨਿਰਾਲਾ
transliteration: Sat Samound Samaai Lai Bhavajal Andari Rahay Niraalaa.
translation: Gurmukhs moving in the holy congregation and having controlled the seven seas remain detached in this world ocean.

gurmukhi: ਸਤੇ ਦੀਪ ਅਨ੍ਹੇਰੁ ਹੈ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਦੀਪਕੁ ਸਬਦ ੳੁਜਾਲਾ
transliteration: Satay Deep Anhayr Hai Guramoukhi Deepaku Sabad Ujaalaa.
translation: All the seven continents are in darkness; gurmukh enlightener them by lamp of Word.

gurmukhi: ਸਤੇ ਪੁਰੀਅਾ ਸੋਧੀਅਾ ਸਹਜ ਪੁਰੀ ਸਚੀ ਧ੍ਰਮਸਾਲਾ
transliteration: Satay Pureeaa Sodheeaa Sahaj Puree Sachee Dharamasaalaa.
translation: The gurmukh has reformed all the seven purls (abodes of gods), and has found that only the state of equipoise is the real abode of truth.

gurmukhi: ਸਤੇ ਰੋਹਣਿ ਸਤ ਵਾਰ ਸਾਧੇ ਫੜਿ ਫੜਿ ਮਥੇ ਵਾਲਾ
transliteration: Satay Rohani Sat Vaar Saadhay Dharhi Dharhi Maday Vaalaa.
translation: All the major nakstrs such as Sva-ti etc, and the seven days, he has controlled by holding them from their heads i.e. he has gone beyond their deceptions.

gurmukhi: ਤ੍ਰੈ ਸਤੇ ਬ੍ਹਮੰਡਿ ਕਰਿ ਵੀਹ ੲਿਕੀਹ ੳੁਲੰਘਿ ਸੁਖਾਲਾ
transliteration: Trai Satay Brahamandi Kari Veeh Ikeeh Ulaghi Soukhaalaa.
translation: Twenty-one cities and their ostentations he has crossed and he lives happily (in his self).

gurmukhi: ਸਤੇ ਸੁਰ ਭਰਪੂਰੁ ਕਰਿ ਸਤੀ ਧਾਰੀ ਪਾਰਿ ਪਿਅਾਲਾ
transliteration: Satay Sur Bharapooru Kari Satee Dhaaree Paari Piaalaa.
translation: He has known the comprehensiveness of the seven melodies (of music) and he has crossed the seven streams of the mountains.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦ ਸਮਾਲਾ ||੮||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Gur Sabad Samaalaa ?8?
translation: This could be possible because he has sustained and accomplished the Word of the Guru in the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ੯ ਮਨਵਸ, ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗ-ਅੱਠ ਗਿਣਤੀ
translation: Association with the saints  the count of eight,  -

gurmukhi: ਅਠਖੰਡਿ ਪਾਖੰਡ ਮਤਿ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ੲਿਕ ਮਨਿ ੲਿਕ ਧਿਅਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Atd Khandi Paakhand Mati Guramati Ik Mani Ik Dhiaaiaa.
translation: The person conducting in accordance with the wisdom of the Guru, goes beyond the hypocrisies of eight division (of four varnas and four ashramas) and adores the Lord with single minded devotion.

gurmukhi: ਅਸਟਧਾਤੁ ਪਾਰਸ ਮਿਲੀ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਕੰਚਨੁ ਜੋਤਿ ਜਗਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Asat Dhaatu Paaras Milee Guramoukhi Kanchanu Joti Jagaaiaa.
translation: Eight metals in the form of four vamas and four religions having met the philosopher's stone in the form of Guru have convereted themselves into gold, the gurmukh, the enlightened one.

gurmukhi: ਰਿਧਿ ਸਿਧਿ ਸਿਧ ਸਾਧਿਕਾਂ ਅਾਦਿ ਪੁਰਖ ਅਾਦੇਸੁ ਕਰਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Ridhi Sidhi Sidh Saadhikaan Aadi Purakh Aadaysu Karaaiaa.
translation: The siddhs and other miraculous practitioners have saluted to that primal Lord alone.

gurmukhi: ਅਠੇ ਪਹਰ ਅਰਾਧੀਅੈ ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Atdai Pahar Araadheeai Sabad Surati Liv Alakhu Lakhaaiaa.
translation: That Lord ought to be adored all the eight watches of time; by merger of the consciousness in the Word, the imperceptible is perceived.

gurmukhi: ਅਸਟ ਕੁਲੀ ਵਿਹੁ ੳੁਤਰੀ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਮਤਿ ਨ ਮੋਹੇ ਮਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Asat Kulee Vihu Outaree Satigur Mati N Mohay Maaiaa.
translation: By adopting the advice of the true Gum, the poison (stigma) of the eight generations is wiped out and now the intellect does not get deluded due to maya.

gurmukhi: ਮਨੁ ਅਸਾਧੁ ਨ ਸਾਧੀਅੈ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਫਲੁ ਸਾਧਿ ਸਧਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Manu Asaadhu N Saadheeai Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Saadhi Sadhaaiaa.
translation: The gurmukhs by their loving devotion have refined the incorrigible mind.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਮਨ ਵਸਿ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ ||੯||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Mili Man Vasi Aaiaa ?9?
translation: The mind is controlled only by meeting the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ੧੦ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗ-ਨੌਂ ਗਿਣਤੀ
translation: Gurmat, association with saint  the count of nine  -

gurmukhi: ਨੳੁ ਪਰਕਾਰੀ ਭਗਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਸਾਧੈ ਨਵੈ ਦੁਅਾਰ ਗੁਰਮਤੀ
transliteration: Nau Parakaaree Bhagati Kari Saadhai Navai Duaar Guramatee.
translation: People adopt ninefold devotion but the gurmukh while adopting the wisdom of Guru accomplishes the nine doors.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਿਰਮੁ ਚਖਾੲਿਅਾ ਗਾਵੈ ਜੀਭ ਰਸਾੲਿਣਿ ਰਤੀ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Piramu Chakhaaiaa Gaavai Jeebh Rasaaini Ratee.
translation: Tasting the joy of love, the Gurmukh with full attachment, recites the praises of the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਨਵੀ ਖੰਡੀ ਜਾਣਾੲਿਅਾ ਰਾਜੁ ਜੋਗੁ ਜਿਣਿ ਸਤੀ ਅਸਤੀ
transliteration: Navee Khandee Jaanaaiaa Raaju Jog Jini Satee Asatee.
translation: Through Rajyoga, the gurmukh has conquered both the truth and the falsehood and thus he is known all over the nine regions of the earth.

gurmukhi: ਨੳੁ ਕਰਿ ਨੳੁ ਘਰ ਸਾਧਿਅਾ ਵਰਤਮਾਨ ਪਰਲੳੁ ੳੁਤਪਤੀ
transliteration: Nau Kari Nau Ghar Saadhiaa Varatamaan Paralau Outapatee.
translation: Becoming humble he has disciplined the nine doors and besides he has diffused himself in creation and dissolution.

gurmukhi: ਨਵ ਨਿਧੀ ਪਿਛ ਲਗਣੀ ਨਾਥ ਅਨਾਥ ਸਨਾਥ ਜੁਗਤੀ
transliteration: Nav Nidhi Pichhalaganee Naad Anaad Sanaad Jougatee.
translation: The nine treasures follow him earnestly and the gurmukh unfolds to the nine naths, the technique of getting liberated.

gurmukhi: ਨੳੁ ੳੁਖਲ ਵਿਚਿ ੳੁਖਲੀ ਮਿਠੀ ਕੳੁੜੀ ਠੰਢੀ ਤਤੀ
transliteration: Nau Oukhal Vichi Oukhalee Mitdee Kaurhee Tdaddhee Tatee.
translation: Among the nine sockets (in the humanbody), the tongue which was bitter, sweet, hot and cool, now

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਸਣਖਤੀ ||੧੦||
transliteration: Saadh Sangati Guramati Sanakhatee ?10?
translation: Due to the association with the holy congregation and the wisdom of Guru, has become blest and full of delights.

gurmukhi: ੧੧ ਸਿਖ ਕੀਹ ਕਰੇ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗ
translation: What a Sikh ought to do  ?

gurmukhi: ਦੇਖਿ ਪਰਾੲੀਅਾ ਚੰਗੀਅਾ ਮਾਵਾਂ ਭੈਣਾਂ ਧੀਅਾਂ ਜਾਣੈ
transliteration: Daykhi Paraaeeaan Changeeaan Maavaan Bhainaan Dheeaan Jaanai.
translation: The Sikh ought to treat beautiful women of others as his mothers, sisters, and daughters.

gurmukhi: ੳੁਸੁ ਸੂਅਰੁ ੳੁਸੁ ਗਾੲਿ ਹੈ ਪਰ ਧਨ ਹਿੰਦੂ ਮੁਸਲਮਾਣੈ
transliteration: Ousu Sooaru Ousu Gaai Hai Par Dhan Hindoo Mousalamaanai.
translation: Others' wealth for him is as beef for Hindu and pork for a Muslim.

gurmukhi: ਪੁਤ੍ਰ ਕਲਤ੍ਰ ਕੁਟੰਬੁ ਦੇਖਿ ਮੋਹੇ ਮੋਹਿ ਨ ਧੋਹਿ ਧਿਙਾਣੈ
transliteration: Poutr Kalatr Koutanbu Daykhi Mohay Mohi N Dhohi Dhiaanai.
translation: Out of infatuation for his son, wife or family, he should not betray and deceive anyone.

gurmukhi: ੳੁਸਤਤਿ ਨਿੰਦਾ ਕੰਨਿ ਸੁਣਿ ਅਾਪਹੁ ਬੁਰਾ ਨ ਅਾਖਿ ਵਖਾਣੈ
transliteration: Ousatati Nidaa Kanni Souni Aapahu Buraa N Aakhi Vakhaanai.
translation: While listening to the praises and slander of others, he should not talk ill of anybody.

gurmukhi: ਵਡ ਪਰਤਾਪੁ ਨ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਣਿ ਕਰਿ ਅਹੰਮੇੳੁ ਨ ਕਿਸੈ ਰਞਞਞਞਾਣੈ
transliteration: Vad Parataapu N Aapu Gani Kari Ahanmayu N Kisai Raanai.
translation: Neither he should count himself as great and glorious nor should he out of his ego, snub anybody.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਫਲ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ ਰਾਜੁ ਜੋਗੁ ਰਸ ਰਲੀਅਾ ਮਾਣੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phal Paaiaa Raaju Jogu Ras Raleeaa Maanai.
translation: Gurmukh of such a nature practises Raj yoga (the highest yoga), lives peacefully a

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਵਿਟਹੁ ਕੁਰਬਾਣੈ ||੧੧||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Vitahu Kurabaanai ?11?
translation: And goes to sacrifice his self unto the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ੧੨ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਦੀ ਅਵਸਥਾ
translation: The state of a Gurmukh

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਿਰਮ ਚਖਾੲਿਅਾ ਭੁਖ ਨ ਖਾਣੁ ਪੀਅਣੁ ਅੰਨੁ ਪਾਣੀ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Piramu Chakhaaiaa Bhoukh N Khaanu Peeanu Annu Paanee.
translation: The gurmukh having tasted the joy of love feels no desire for food and ink.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਨੀਂਦ ੳੁਘੜੀ ਜਾਗਦਿਅਾਂ ਸੁਖ ਰੈਣਿ ਵਿਹਾਣੀ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Neend Ougharhee Jaagadiaan Soukh Raini Vihaanee.
translation: Due to the merger of his consciousness in the Word, he gets no eep and by getting awake, he spends his night delightfully.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਹੇ ਬਧੇ ਸੋਹਦੇ ਮੈਲਾਪੜ ਪਰਵਾਣੁ ਪਰਾਣੀ
transliteration: Saahay Badhay Sohaday Mailaaparh Paravaanu Paraanee.
translation: As for a few ays before marriage, the bride and the bridegroom look beautiful even in gs, the gurmukhs also remain adorned.

gurmukhi: ਚਲਣੁ ਜਾਣਿ ਸੁਜਾਣ ਹੋੲਿ ਜਗ ਮਿਹਮਾਨ ਅਾੲੇ ਮਿਹਮਾਣੀ
transliteration: Chalanu Jaani Sujaan Hoi Jag Mihamaan Aaay Mihamaanee.
translation: Since they understand the mystery f going from the world, they live like guests in the world (who must sooner r later go).

gurmukhi: ਸਚੁ ਵਣਜਿ ਖੇਪ ਲੈ ਚਲੇ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਗਾਡੀ ਰਾਹੁ ਨੀਸਾਣੀ
transliteration: Sachu Vanaji Khayp Lai Chalay Guramoukhi Gaadee Raahu Neesaanee.
translation: Being familiar with the highway of the wisdom of the Guru, Gurmukhs move on it with full load of the truthful merchandise.

gurmukhi: ਹਲਤਿ ਪਲਤਿ ਮੁਖ ੳੁਜਲੇ ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖ ਗੁਰਸਿਖਾਂ ਮਨਿ ਭਾਣੀ
transliteration: Halati Palati Moukh Ujalay Gur Sikh Gurasikhaan Mani Bhaanee.
translation: The Sikhs ove the teachings of the Guru and their faces remain bright in this and in the world hereafter.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਅਕਥ ਕਹਾਣੀ ||੧੨||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Vichi Akad Kahaanee ?12?
translation: Always in the holy congregation, the ineffable story of the grandeur of) the Lord is told.

gurmukhi: ੧੩ ਸਿੱਖੀ ਸਾਧਨ, ਸਾਧਸੰਗ
translation: Accept the will of the Lord in the holy congregation ,

gurmukhi: ਹੳੁਮੈ ਗਰਬੁ ਨਿਵਾਰੀਅੈ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਰਿਦੈ ਗਰੀਬੀ ਅਾਵੈ
transliteration: Haoumai Garabu Nivaareeai Guramoukhi Ridai Gareebee Aavai.
translation: Repudiating pride and ego a gurmukh should be humble.

gurmukhi: ਗਿਅਾਨ ਮਤੀ ਘਟਿ ਚਾਨਣਾ ਭਰਮ ਅਗਿਅਾਨੁ ਅੰਧੇਰੁ ਮਿਟਾਵੈ
transliteration: Giaan Matee Ghati Chaananaa Bharam Agiaanu Andhayru Mitaavai.
translation: With the light of knowledge in his mind he should dispel darkness of ignorance and delusions.

gurmukhi: ਹੋੲਿ ਨਿਮਾਣਾ ਢਹਿ ਪਵੈ ਦਰਗਹ ਮਾਣੁ ਨਿਮਾਣਾ ਪਾਵੈ
transliteration: Hoi Nimaanaa Ddhahi Pavai Daragah Maanu Nimaanaa Paavai.
translation: He should fall on the feet (of Lord) in humility because only the humble are honoured in the court of the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਖਸਮੈ ਸੋੲੀ ਭਾਵਦਾ ਖਸਮੈ ਦਾ ਜਿਸੁ ਭਾਣਾ ਭਾਵੈ
transliteration: Khasamai Soee Bhaanvadaa Khasamai Daa Jisu Bhaanaa Bhaavai.
translation: Master also loves that man who loves the will of the master.

gurmukhi: ਭਾਣਾ ਮੰਨੈ ਮੰਨੀਅੈ ਅਾਪਣਾ ਭਾਣਾ ਅਾਪਿ ਮਨਾਵੈ
transliteration: Bhaanaa Mannai Manneeai Aapanaa Bhaanaa Aapi Manaavai.
translation: One who accepts the will of God is accepted by one understands that he is a guest in this world;

gurmukhi: ਦੁਨੀਅਾ ਵਿਚਿ ਪਰਾਹੁਣਾ ਦਾਵਾ ਛਡਿ ਰਹੈ ਲਾ ਦਾਵੈ
transliteration: Douneeaa Vichi Paraahounaa Daavaa Chhadi Rahai Laa Daavai.
translation: That is why foregoing all claims, he lives without making any claim for himself.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਹੁਕਮਿ ਕਮਾਵੈ ||੧੩||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Mili Houkami Kamaavai ?13?
translation: Being in the holy congregation, he acts in consonance with the commands of the Lord.

gurmukhi: ੧੪ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਕਾਰ, ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗ
translation: Only one Lord adored in the holy congregation ,

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰੁ ਪਰਮੇਸਰੁ ੲਿਕੁ ਜਾਣਿ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਦੂਜਾ ਭਾੳੁ ਮਿਟਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guru Paramaysaru Iku Jaani Guramoukhi Doojaa Bhaau Mitaaiaa.
translation: Accepting Guru and God as one, the gurmukh has erased the sense of duality.

gurmukhi: ਹੳੁਮੈ ਪਾਲਿ ਢਹਾੲਿਕੈ ਤਾਲ ਨਦੀ ਦਾ ਨੀਰੁ ਮਿਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Haoumai Paali Ddhahaai Kai Taal Nadee Daa Neeru Milaaiaa.
translation: Knocking down the wall of ego, the gurmukh has united the pond (self) with the  river (Brahm).

gurmukhi: ਨਦੀ ਕਿਨਾਰੈ ਦੁਹ ਵਲੀ ੲਿਕਦੂ ਪਾਰਾਵਾਰੁ ਨ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Nadee Kinaarai Duh Valee Ik Doo Paaraavaaru N Paaiaa.
translation: Undoubtedly the river remains contained within its two banks neither one knowing the other.

gurmukhi: ਰੁਖਹੁ ਫਲੁ ਤੈ ਫਲਹੁ ਰੁਖੁ ੲਿਕੁ ਨਾੳੁ ਫਲੁ ਰੁਖੁ ਸਦਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Roukhahu Phalu Tai Phalahu Roukhu Iku Naau Phalu Roukhu Sadaaiaa.
translation: From tree the fruit and from fruit the e are born and in fact both are one though they have different names.

gurmukhi: ਛਿਅ ਰੁਤੀ ੲਿਕੁ ਸੁਝ ਹੈ ਸੁਝੈ ਸੁਝੁ ਨ ਹੋਰੁ ਦਿਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Chhia Routee Iku Sujh Hai Sujhai Sujhu N Horu Dikhaaiaa.
translation: The sun is one in all the six seasons; knowing this, one does not think of different suns.

gurmukhi: ਰਾਤੀਂ ਤਾਰੇ ਚਮਕਦੇ ਦਿਹ ਚੜਿਅੈ ਕਿਨਿ ਅਾਖੁ ਲੁਕਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Raateen Taaray Chamakaday Dih Charhiai Kini Aakhu Loukaaiaa.
translation: At night the stars twinkle but with the break of day under whose command they hide themselves? (they automatically go and likewise with light of knowledge the darkness of ignorance is dispelled of its own).

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ੲਿਕ ਮਨਿ ੲਿਕੁ ਧਿਅਾੲਿਅਾ ||੧੪||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Ik Mani Iku Dhiaaiaa ?14?
translation: The holy congregation, the gurmukhs adore the Lord with single-minded devotion.

gurmukhi: ੧੫ ਅਸਲੀ ਯੋਗ, ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗ
translation: Gursikh a yogi ,

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਜੋਗੀ ਜਾਗਦੇ ਮਾੲਿਅਾ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਕਰਨਿ ੳੁਦਾਸੀ
transliteration: Gurasikh Jogee Jaagaday Maaiaa Andari Karani Udaasee.
translation: Yogi Sikhs of the Guru are ever awake and remain detached amidst maya.

gurmukhi: ਕੰਨੀ ਮੁੰਦਰਾਂ ਮੰਤ੍ਰ ਗੁਰ ਸੰਤਾਂ ਧੂੜਿ ਬਿਭੂਤ ਸੁ ਲਾਸੀ
transliteration: Kanneen Moundaraan Mantr Gur Santaan Dhoorhi Bibhoot Su Laasee.
translation: Gurumantr for them is the earring and the dust of the feet of saints is ashes for them.

gurmukhi: ਖਿੰਥਾ ਖਿਮਾਂ ਹੰਢਾਵਣੀ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਪਤ੍ਰ ਭਾੳੁ ਭੁਗਤਿ ਬਿਲਾਸੀ
transliteration: Khindaa Khimaa Handdhaavanee Praym Patr Bhaau Bhougati Bilaasee.
translation: Forgiveness is their patched blanket, love their begging bowl and devotion is their trumpet (sitig),

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਸਿੰਙੀ ਵਜੈ ਡੰਡਾ ਗਿਅਾਨੁ ਧਿਅਾਨੁ ਗੁਰਦਾਸੀ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Sinee Vajai Dandaa Giaanu Dhiaanu Gur Daasee.
translation: Knowledge is their staff, and obedience to the Guru is their meditation.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰ ਗੁਫੈ ਬਹਿ ਸਹਜਿ ਸਮਾਧਿ ਅਗਾਧਿ ਨਿਵਾਸੀ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Gur Gudhai Bahi Sahaji Samaadhi Agaadhi Nivaasee.
translation: Sitting in the cave in the form of holy congregation, they reside in unfathomable equipoise.

gurmukhi: ਹੳੁਮੈ ਰੋਗ ਅਰੋਗ ਹੋੲਿ ਕਰਿ ਸੰਜੋਗ ਵਿਜੋਗ ਖਲਾਸੀ
transliteration: Haoumai Rog Arog Hoi Kari Sanjogu Vijog Khalaasee.
translation: Getting cured of the ailment of ego, they are liberated from the bonds of comings and goings (birth and death).

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਸਾਬਾਸੀ ||੧੫||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Guramati Saabaasee ?15?
translation: Holy congregation is applauded because of the wisdom of the Guru that resides in it.

gurmukhi: ੧੬ ਅਾਸ਼ਕ ਹੋਵੇ, ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗ
translation: See yourself as lover of the holy congregation ,

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਬ੍ਹਮੇ ਲਖ ਵੇਦ ਪੜਿ ਨੇਤ ਨੇਤ ਕਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਸਭ ਥਕੇ
transliteration: Lakh Brahamay Lakh Vayd Parhi Nayt Nayt Kari Kari Sabh Dakay.
translation: Millions of Brahmas, reciting millions of Vedas got tired saying nett nett )(this is not, this is not).

gurmukhi: ਮਹਾਦੇਵ ਅਵਧੂਤ ਲਖ ਜੋਗ ਧਿਅਾਨ ੳੁਣੀਦੈ ਅਕੇ
transliteration: Mahaadayv Avadhoot Lakh Jog Dhiaan Ouneedai Akay.
translation: Mahadev and millions of recluses are also fed up with sleeplessness of yogic practice.

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਬਿਸਨ ਅਵਤਾਰ ਲੈ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਖੜਗੁ ਫੜਿ ਪਹੁਚਿ ਨ ਸਕੇ
transliteration: Lakh Bisan Avataar Lai Giaan Kharhagu Dharhi Pahouchi N Sakay.
translation: Becoming millions of incarnations, Visnu even catching hold of the double edged sword of knowledge could not reach Him.

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਲੋਮਸੁ ਚਿਰ ਜੀਵਣੇ ਅਾਦਿ ਅੰਤਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਧੀਰਕ ਧਕੇ
transliteration: Lakh Lomasu Chir Jeevanay Aadi Anti Vichi Dheerak Dhakay.
translation: Millions of long lived rishi such as Lomas despite their fortitude are, ultimately jostled about.

gurmukhi: ਤਿਨਿ ਲੋਅ ਜੁਗ ਚਾਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਲਖ ਬ੍ਹਮੰਡ ਖੰਡ ਕਰ ਢਕੇ
transliteration: Tini Loa Joug Chaari Kari Lakh Brahamand Khand Kar Ddhakay.
translation: That Lord has covered with His 'self, all the three worlds, four ages, millions of universes and their divisions, i.e.

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਪਰਲੳੁ ੳੁਤਪਤਿ ਲਖ ਹਰਹਟ ਮਾਲਾ ਅਖਿ ਫਰਕੇ
transliteration: Lakh Paralau Outapati Lakh Harahat Maalaa Akhi Dharakay.
translation: He is bigger than these all. Millions of creations and dissolutions go on moving like the chain of pots on persian wheel and all this is enacted  within the time of the fall of an eyelid.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਅਾਸਕੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਤਕੇ ||੧੬||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Aasaku Hoi Takay ?6?
translation: If someone becomes lover of the ,holy congregation, only then he can understand this mystery

gurmukhi: ੧੭ ਮਨ ਜਿਤ, ਅਾਪ ਜਿਤ, ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗ
translation: The world is conquered only by conquering the mind ,  ,

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਬ੍ਹਮੁ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮੁ ਅਾਦਿ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਹੈ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸੋੲੀ
transliteration: Paarabraham Pooran Braham Aadi Purakh Hai Satiguru Soee.
translation: Transcendental Brahm is the perfect Brahm; He is the primal cosmic spirit (purakh) and the true Guru.

gurmukhi: ਜੋਗ ਧਿਅਾਨੁ ਹੈਰਾਨੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਵੇਦ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਪਰਵਾਹ ਨ ਹੋੲੀ
transliteration: Jog Dhiaan Hairaanu Hoi Vayd Giaan Paravaah N Hoee.
translation: Yogis became awestruck in meditation for He does not care for knowledge of the Vedas.

gurmukhi: ਦੇਵੀ ਦੇਵ ਸਰੇਵਦੇ ਜਲ ਥਲ ਮਹੀਅਲ ਭਵਦੀ ਲੋੲੀ
transliteration: Dayvee Dayv Sarayvaday Jal Dal Maheeal Bhavaday Loee.
translation: Adoring the gods and goddesses, people go on roaming (in different lives) in water on earth and in the sky.

gurmukhi: ਹੋਮ ਜਗ ਜਪ ਤਪ ਘਣੇ ਕਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਕਰਮ ਧਰਮ ਦੁਖ ਰੋੲੀ
transliteration: Hom Jag Jap Tap Ghanay Kari Kari Karam Dharam Doukh Roee.
translation: They perform many burnt offerings, oblations and ascetic disciplines and still weep while performing the so-called ritualistic activities (because their sufferings are not removed).

gurmukhi: ਵਸਿ ਨ ਅਾਵੈ ਧਾਵਦਾ ਅਠੁ ਖੰਡਿ ਪਾਖੰਡ ਵਿਗੋੲੀ
transliteration: Vasi N Aavai Dhaanvadaa Atdu Khandi Paakhand Vigoee.
translation: Ever-running mind does not come under control and the mind has spoiled all the eight divisions of life (four varnas and four ashrams).

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮਨੁ ਜਿਣਿ ਜਗੁ ਜਿਣੈ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਵਾੲਿ ਅਾਪੇ ਸਭ ਕੋੲੀ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Manu Jini Jagu Jinai Aapu Gavaai Aapay Sabh Koee.
translation: The gurmukhs after conquering the mind have won the whole world and losing their ego, they have seen themselves in one and all.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਣ ਹਾਰੁ ਪਰੋੲੀ ||੧੭||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Goun Haaru Paroee ?17?
translation: The gurmukhs have prepared the garland of virtues in the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ੧੮ ਗੁਰੂ ਮਲਾਹ, ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗ
translation: Guru, the boat man and association with the saints ,

gurmukhi: ਅਲਖ ਨਿਰੰਜਨੁ ਅਾਖੀਅੈ ਰੂਪ ਨ ਰੇਖ ਅਲੇਖ ਅਪਾਰਾ
transliteration: Alakh Niranjanu Aakheeai Roop N Raykh Alaykh Apaaraa.
translation: The imperceptible and blemishless Lord is said to be beyond all the forms and writs.

gurmukhi: ਅਬਿਗਤਿ ਗਤਿ ਅਬਿਗਤਿ ਘਣੀ ਸਿਮਰਣਿ ਸੇਖ ਨ ਅਾਵੈ ਵਾਰਾ
transliteration: Abigati Gati Abigati Ghanee Simarani Saykh N Aavai Vaaraa.
translation: The nature of that unmanifest Lord is also deeply unmanifest, and in spite of continuous recitations by Sesanffg His mystery could not be understood.

gurmukhi: ਅਕਥ ਕਥਾ ਕਿੳੁਂ ਜਾਣੀਅੈ ਕੋੲਿ ਨ ਅਾਖਿ ਸੁਣਾਵਣਹਾਰਾ
transliteration: Akad Kadaa Kiu Jaaneeai Koi N Aakhi Sounaavanahaaraa.
translation: How can His ineffable story be known because none is there to tell it.

gurmukhi: ਅਚਰਜੁ ਨੋ ਅਾਚਰਜੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਵਿਸਮਾਦੈ ਵਿਸਮਾਦੁ ਸੁਮਾਰਾ
transliteration: Acharaju No Aacharaju Hoi Visamaadai Visamaadu Soumaaraa.
translation: Thinking about Him, the wonder also feels itself full of wonder and the awe also becomes awe struck.

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰਿ ਵਰਨ ਗੁਰੁ ਸਿਖ ਹੋੲਿ ਘਰ ਬਾਰੀ ਬਹੁ ਵਣਜ ਵਪਾਰਾ
transliteration: Chaari Varan Guru Sikh Hoi Ghar Baaree Bahu Vanaj Vapaaraa.
translation: Becoming the Sikh of the Guru the people of all the four varnas leading the household life,

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਅਾਰਾਧਿਅਾ ਭਗਤਿ ਵਛਲੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਰੂਪੁ ਮੁਰਾਰਾ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Aaraadhiaa Bhagati Vachhalu Guru Roopu Muraaraa.
translation: Have undertaken to perform various types of business and trade.

gurmukhi: ਭਵ ਸਾਗਰੁ ਗੁਰਿ ਸਾਗਰ ਤਾਰਾ ||੧੮||
transliteration: Bhav Saagaru Guri Saagar Taaraa ?18?
translation: In the holy congregations, they adore the Guru-God, affectionate towards the devotees, and the Guru gets them go across the world-ocean.

gurmukhi: ੧੯ ਗੁਰੂ ਨੂੰ ਸੋਝੀ ਪਾੲੀ
translation: Gurmukh attains the wisdom of understanding

gurmukhi: ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰੁ ੲੇਕੰਕਾਰੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਓਅੰਕਾਰਿ ਅਕਾਰੁ ਅਪਾਰਾ
transliteration: Nirankaaru Aykankaaru Hoi Aoankaari Akaaru Apaaraa.
translation: The formless Lord assuming the form of ekarikcir created myriad names and forms out of Oankar.

gurmukhi: ਰੋਮ ਰੋਮ ਵਿਚਿ ਰਖਿਓਨੁ ਕਰਿ ਬ੍ਹਮੰਡ ਕਰੋੜਿ ਪਸਾਰਾ
transliteration: Rom Rom Vichi Rakhiaonu Kari Brahamand Karorhi Pasaaraa.
translation: In His each trichome He has kept the expanse of crores of universes.

gurmukhi: ਕੇਤੜਿਅਾ ਜੁਗ ਵਰਤਿਅਾ ਅਗਮ ਅਗੋਚਰ ਧੁੰਧੂਕਾਰਾ
transliteration: Kaytarhiaan Joug Varatiaa Agam Agocharu Dhoundhookaaraa.
translation: None knows for how many yugs, ages, there was imperceptible and impenetrable mist.

gurmukhi: ਕੇਤੜਿਅਾ ਜੁਗ ਵਰਤਿਅਾ ਕਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਕੇਤੜਿਅਾ ਅਵਤਾਰਾ
transliteration: Kaytarhiaan Joug Varatiaa Kari Kari Kaytarhiaan Avataaraa.
translation: For many ages continued the activities of many an incarnation (of God).

gurmukhi: ਭਗਤਿ ਵਛਲੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ ਕਲੀਕਾਲ ਪਰਗਟ ਪਾਹਾਰਾ
transliteration: Bhagati Vachhalu Hoi Aaiaa Kalee Kaal Paragat Paahaaraa.
translation: The same God, for the sake of his love for the devotees, has appeared in Kalijug (in the form of Guru).

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਵਸਗਤਿ ਹੋਅਾ ਓਤਿ ਪੋਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਪਿਰਮ ਪਿਅਾਰਾ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Vasagati Hoaa Aoti Poti Kari Piram Piaaraa.
translation: Being like warp and weft and the lover and the beloved one He, controlled by the holy congregation, resides there in.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਝੈ ਸਿਰਜਣਾਹਾਰਾ ||੧੯||
transliteration: Guramoukhi Sujhai Sirajanahaaraa ?19?
translation: Only gurmukh possesses the knowledge of that creator Lord.

gurmukhi: ੨੦ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਤੇ ਸਿੱਖ, ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗ
translation: The true Guru and the Sikh, association with the saints)  ,

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਪਰਗਟੀ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਸਬਦ ਵਿਚਾਰਾ
transliteration: Satigur Moorati Paragatee Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Sabad Vichaaraa.
translation: With the emergence of the true Guru, the gurmukhs got the pleasure fruit of the pondering upon the Word.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕਦੂ ਹੋੲਿ ਸਹਸ ਫਲੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਸਿਖ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਓਅੰਕਾਰਾ
transliteration: Ikadoo Hoi Sahas Phalu Guru Sikh Saadh Sangati Aoankaaraa.
translation: From that one Oankar, thousands of fruits emerged in the form of Gum, Sikh, and holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ਡਿਠਾ ਸੁਣਿਅਾ ਮੰਨਿਅਾ ਸਨਮੁਖਿ ਸੇ ਵਿਰਲੇ ਸੈਸਾਰਾ
transliteration: Ditdaa Souniaa Manniaa Sanamoukhi Say Viralay Saisaaraa.
translation: Rare are the Gurmukhs who being face to face with the Guru have seen him, listened to him and have obeyed his commands.

gurmukhi: ਪਹਿਲੋ ਦੇ ਪਾਖਾਕ ਹੋੲਿ ਪਿਛਹੁ ਜਗੁ ਮੰਗੈ ਪਗ ਛਾਰਾ
transliteration: Pahilo Day Paa Khaak Hoi Pichhahu Jagu Mangai Pag Chhaaraa.
translation: First, they become the dust of the feet of the Guru and later on, the whole world desires the dust of their feet.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮਾਰਗੁ ਚਲਿਅਾ ਸਚੁ ਵਣਜੁ ਕਰਿ ਪਾਰਿ ੳੁਤਾਰਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Maaragu Chaliaa Sachu Vanaju Kari Paari Outaaraa.
translation: Treading the path of Gurmukhs and transacting in truth, one goes across (the world ocean).

gurmukhi: ਕੀਮਤਿ ਕੋੲਿ ਨ ਜਾਣੲੀ ਅਾਖਣਿ ਸੁਣਨਿ ਨ ਲਿਖਣਿਹਾਰਾ
transliteration: Keemati Koi N Jaanaee Aakhani Sounani N Likhanihaaraa.
translation: None knows the glory of such persons nor can it be written, listened to and talked about.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦੁ ਪਿਅਾਰਾ ||੨੦||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Gur Sabadu Piaaraa ?20?
translation: In the holy congregation, only the word of the Guru, is loved.

gurmukhi: ੨੧ ਗੁਰ ਚੇਲੇ ਦਾ ਮੇਲ
translation: Union of Guru and disciple

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰੁ ਸਬਦ ਲਿਵ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਫਲੁ ਪਿਰਮ ਚਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Guru Sabad Liv Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Piramu Chakhaaiaa.
translation: After merging their consciousness in the word of the Guru and the holy congregation, the gutmukhs have tasted the pleasure fruit in the form of contemplation of the Sabad.

gurmukhi: ਸਭ ਨਿਧਾਨ ਕੁਰਬਾਨ ਕਰਿ ਸਭੇ ਫਲ ਬਲਿਹਾਰ ਕਰਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Sabh Nidhaan Kurabaan Kari Sabhay Phal Balihaar Karaaiaa.
translation: For this fruit, they have offered all the treasures and other fruits also have been sacrificed for the same.

gurmukhi: ਤ੍ਰਿਸਨਾ ਜਲਣਿ ਬੁਝਾੲੀਅਾਂ ਸਾਂਤਿ ਸਹਜ ਸੰਤੋਖੁ ਦਿੜਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Trisanaa Jalani Bujhaaeeaan Saanti Sahaj Santokhu Dirhaaiaa.
translation: This fruit has quenched all desires and fires and has further firmed up the feeling of peace, equipoise and contentment.

gurmukhi: ਸਭੇ ਅਾਸਾ ਪੂਰੀਅਾ ਅਾਸਾ ਵਿਚਿ ਨਿਰਾਸੁ ਵਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Sabhay Aasaa Pooreeaa Aasaa Vichi Niraasu Valaaiaa.
translation: All the hopes have been fulfilled and now the feeling of detachment towards them has come up.

gurmukhi: ਮਨਸਾ ਮਨਹਿ ਸਮਾੲਿਲੈ ਮਨ ਕਾਮਨ ਨਿਹਕਾਮ ਨ ਧਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Manasaa Manahi Samaai Lai Man Kaaman Nihakaam N Dhaaiaa.
translation: The waves of mind have been subsumed in the mind itself and mind now having become free of desires does not run in any direction.

gurmukhi: ਕਰਮ ਕਾਲ ਜਮਜਾਲ ਕਟਿ ਕਰਮ ਕਰੇ ਨਿਹਕਰਮ ਰਹਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Karam Kaal Jam Jaal Kati Karam Karay Nihakaram Rahaaiaa.
translation: Cutting asunder the rituals and the noose of death, the mind while becoming active has become free of desires for reward.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ੳੁਪਦੇਸੁ ਅਵੇਸੁ ਕਰਿ ਪੈਰੀ ਪੈ ਜਗੁ ਪੈਰੀ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Gur Oupadays Avaysu Kari Pairee Pai Jagu Pairee Paaiaa.
translation: Getting inspired by the teachings of the Guru, first, the gurmukh fell on the feet of the Guru and then he made the whole world fall cn his feet.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਚੇਲੇ ਪਰਚਾ ਪਰਚਾੲਿਅਾ ||੨੧||੨੯||
transliteration: Gur Chaylay Parachaa Parachaaiaa ?21?29?ounateeha?
translation: This way, being with the Guru, the disciple has identified Love.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਸੰਧ ਮਿਲੇ ਪੰਚ ਪਰਪੰਚ ਮਿਟੇ ਪੰਚ ਪਰਧਾਨੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Liv Gursikh Sandh Milay , Panch Parapanch Mitay Panch Paradhaanay Hai ?
translation: With the meeting of Guru and Sikh, and engrossment of the latter in the divine word, he is able to counter the deceit of five vices-kam, krodh, lobh, moh and ahankar. The five virtues of Truth, Contentment, Compassion, Devotion and Patience become paramou

gurmukhi: ਭਾਗੈ ਭੈ ਭਰਮ ਭੇਦ ਕਾਲ ਅੳੁ ਕਰਮ ਖੇਦ ਲੋਗ ਬੇਦ ੳੁਲੰਘਿ ੳੁਦੋਤ ਗੁਰ ਗਿਅਾਨੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Bhaagai Bhai Bharam Bhayd Kaal Au Karam Khayda , Log Bayd Ulanghi Udot Gur Giaanay Hai ?
translation: All his doubts, fear and discriminatory feelings are destroyed. He is not hunted by the worldly discomforts those accrue from worldly activities.

gurmukhi: ਮਾੲਿਅਾ ਅੳੁ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਸਮ ਦਸਮ ਦੁਅਾਰ ਪਾਰਿ ਅਨਹਦ ਰੁਨਝੁਨ ਬਾਜਤ ਨੀਸਾਨੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Maaiaa Au Braham Sam Dasam Duaar Paari , Anahad Rounajhoun Baajat Neesaanay Hai ?
translation: With his conscious awareness firmly lodged in the mystical tenth opening, the worldly attractions and Lord appears alike to him. He sees the image of the Lord in every creature of the world. And in such a state, he remains engrossed in the celestial music

gurmukhi: ੳੁਨਮਨ ਮਗਨ ਗਗਨ ਜਗਮਗ ਜੋਤਿ ਨਿਝਰ ਅਪਾਰ ਧਾਰ ਪਰਮ ਨਿਧਾਨੇ ਹੈ ||੨੯||
transliteration: Ounaman Magan Gagan Jagamag Joti , Nijhar Apaar Dhaar Param Nidhaanay Hai ?29?
translation: In such a high spiritual state, he enjoys heavenly bliss and the divine light shines in him. He is ever relishing the divine elixir of Naam. (29)
